commit.message: Added a lint which corrects expressions like (a - b) < f32::EPSILON

files.patch:
@@ -661,6 +661,13 @@ pub static ref ALL_LINTS: Vec<Lint> = vec![
         deprecation: None,
         module: "misc",
     },
+    Lint {
+        name: "float_equality_without_abs",
+        group: "correctness",

+        deprecation: None,
+        module: "float_equality_without_abs",
+    },
